USER QUERY: When I double-tap the Back Gate switch (fast on twice) on weekend evenings between 18:00 and 22:00, set the Family Room to 50% with a fast ramp. Then, at sunset +10 minutes each day, if Far Back Spots are off, turn them on and set their backlight to 80%. Also, during weekdays (Mon-Fri) between 09:00 and 17:00, when the Family Room is turned on (status changes >0), immediately turn on the Back Gate and set the Family Room On Level to 30%; if the Family Room turns off during that period, turn the Back Gate off.

__BEGIN_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
{
  "routine": {
    "id": 101,
    "name": "Weekend double-tap -> FamilyRoom 50% + Daily sunset FarBackSpots + Weekday FamilyRoom -> BackGate",
    "parent": 0,
    "comment": "Combined routines: weekend double-tap, daily sunset, and weekday COS handling",
    "if": [
      { "(": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "1B F8 49 1", "control": "DFON", "parameters": [ { "name": "tapCount", "value": 2, "uom": "108", "precision": 0 } ] } },
        { "and": 1 },
        { "weekly": { "days": "sat,sun", "from": { "time": "18:00", "to": { "time": "22:00" } } } },
      { ")": 1 },
      { "or": 1 },
      { "at": { "sunset": 600 } },
      { "or": 1 },
      { "(": 1 },
        { ">": { "device": "12 39 A7 1", "status": "ST", "value": 0, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } },
        { "and": 1 },
        { "weekly": { "days": "mon,tue,wed,thu,fri", "from": { "time": "09:00", "to": { "time": "17:00" } } } },
      { ")": 1 }
    ],
    "then": [
      { "device": "12 39 A7 1", "command": "RR", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 27, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "12 39 A7 1", "command": "DON", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 50, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "1B F7 E 1", "command": "DON" },
      { "device": "1B F7 E 1", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 80, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "1B F8 49 1", "command": "DON" },
      { "device": "12 39 A7 1", "command": "OL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 30, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } ] }
    ],
    "else": [
      { "device": "1B F8 49 1", "command": "DOF" }
    ],
    "reasoning": "Grouped triggers: (1) weekend double-tap on Back Gate during 18:00-22:00 sets Family Room ramp rate to fast (RR=2.0s -> enum value 27) and sets level to 50%. (2) daily at sunset+600s if Far Back Spots are off, turn them on and set backlight to 80%. (3) weekday COS: when Family Room status becomes >0 during weekdays 09:00-17:00, turn on Back Gate and set Family Room On Level to 30%; else (i.e., Family Room off during that period) turn Back Gate off. Actions use only commands and parameter UOMs/values that exist in the DEVICE STRUCTURE."
  }
}
__END_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
